title: Become a PAMM Manager in 3 steps
card1Text: Submit your details and trading background to be considered for a PAMM Manager setup on the Premier platform.
card2Subtitle: Work with the team to set up your master account, performance fee parameters, and investor profile.
card3Subtitle: Start trading your master account while Premier's PAMM engine manages allocation, reporting, and fee calculations in the background.
ctaTitle: Let your track record attract capital
ctaSubtitle: Use Premier's PAMM infrastructure to turn your trading performance into a scalable fund management business.
